item.title: Contribute
item.description: Help us in our mission to liberate data Contribute reviews via writing a blog post Contribute good vibes via telling your friends about us Thanks for checking us out!

item.title: The Story Behind Plazi
item.description: Placidus Spescha was not only one of the first alpinists and naturalists but was also deeply committed to the ideals of the Enlightenment. He often ran afoul of his superiors who felt he neglected his priestly duties in favor of his scientific pursuits. Worse yet, he further angered the status quo through his sympathy and support of the French in the follow-up of the wars spurred by the French Revolution which brought invasions of French and Austrian troops into his home, Disentis in the Vorderrhein Tal in Switzerland.

item.title: Uses of Data
item.description: Publications on-going Publications using GBIF datasets including Plazi mediated datasets 2017 Hugo W, Hobern D, Kõljalg U, Ó Tuama É, Saarenma H 2017. Global Infrastructures for Biodiversity Data and Services. In: Walters M and Scholes RJ (eds.), The GEO Handbook on Biodiversity Observation Networks, doi: 10.1007/978-3-319-27288-7_11) 2016 Alonso LA, Agosti D 2016. Ants. In: Larsen TH (ed.) 2016. Core Standardized Methods for Rapid Biological Field Assessment. Conservation International, Arlington, VA. pp.
